original_definition: 'suspended certificate' means a certificate temporarily invalidated due to non-conformities identified by the certification body or upon voluntary request of the economic operator;
generated_definition: 'suspended certificate' means a certificate that is temporarily suspended by the issuing authority due to a pending investigation or legal proceedings.

Article\u00a02: ‘suspended certificate’ means a certificate temporarily invalidated due to non-conformities identified by thecertification bodyor upon voluntary request of theeconomic operator;
